name: Go Go Car Boom [Ludum Dare 50]
description:
Ludum Dare 50 submission

How to Play:

An evil villain strapped bombs to your hover car and is forcing you to race. Knock the bombs off your car by hitting the light blue items in the level. Your car will explode if it crosses the finish line with one bomb or more on it.

No brakes! No reverse!

Shout out to The Transporter 2 car bomb scene for the inspiration

Controls:

W = Accelerate

A = Left

D = Right

J = Left Hover Push (Use with A to get a better left turn)

L = Right Hover Push (Use with D to get a better right turn)

Credits:

Russ Moonbase - Code, Design, Car Models

Car Models made with Asset Forge (https://assetforge.io/)

Additional Assets Used:

Race Track Models by Kenney (https://www.kenney.nl/)

Groove Club Music Pack by VOiD1 Gaming (https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/music/groove-club-tune-bundle-demo-174394)

HALFTONE Sound Effects Pack LITE by VOiD1 Gaming (https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/sound-fx/halftone-sound-effects-pack-lite-178439)

i6 German - FREE Engine Sound Pack by slaczky - Skril Studio (https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/sound-fx/transportation/i6-german-free-engine-sound-pack-106037)

FREE Casual Game SFX Pack by Dusty Room (https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/sound-fx/free-casual-game-sfx-pack-54116)

Explosive Toon VFX Texture Free (Particle System) by Gustav Hagerling (https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/vfx/particles/fire-explosions/explosive-toon-vfx-texture-free-11117)
